column4: Hi! I have a cd with the KUBUNTU Linux 6.06 but when i try to start the program nothing happens. The computer starts but nothing happens. How can i make to the compuiter start from the cdrom?
usually one can set the cd as bootable in the bios
how can i make that in the bios? I was ther but i don't understand how can i modify
usually the cdrom can be set as bootable , just like your hard drive , just set cdrom as bootable first of at least before your harddrive
